explains: v. 提醒，使警惕；警告，告诫（不要做……）；预先通知；（体育运动）警告
wordGroup: warn of 警告某人某事
warn against 警告（...）不要；提醒（...）提防

sentences.en: I'll run ahead and warn them.
sentences.cn: 我要跑在前头，警告他们。

sentences.en: I tried to warn him, but he wouldn't listen.
sentences.cn: 我设法提醒过他，可他就是不听。

sentences.en: Lawrence kept on butting me but the referee did not warn him.
sentences.cn: 劳伦斯不断用头撞我，可裁判没有警告他。
